hero.title: Digital Startup Label

taxExemptions.title: Tax Exemptions
taxExemptions.description: Benefit from profit tax and business license exemptions for 5 years.

publicMarkets.title: Public Market Access
publicMarkets.description: Participate in public tenders with preferential conditions for labeled startups.

support.title: Personalized Support
support.description: Enjoy regular follow-up and expert advice to accelerate your growth.

visibility.title: National Visibility
visibility.description: Increase your visibility with partners and investors thanks to the official label.

network.title: Innovators Network

application.title: Application Submission

evaluation.title: Evaluation
